attributes.action: Make high risk children to be offered to get a flu jab before 65's and over
attributes.background: Young children and children with certain underlying health conditions are at increased risk for a hospital stay or severe or complicated influenza infection. Free NHS flu vaccine is always offered 65's and over first. Parents of high risk children are offered a vaccine at the end of flu season.

rejection.details: The offering of flu vaccinations and any prioritisation is a clinical decision.
